typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		dia as string,
		codigo as string,
		tipo as string,
		moeda as string,
		compra_real as string,
		venda_real as string,
		compra_dolar as string,
		venda_dolar as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> cotacoes
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	validationMode: 'none',
	namespaces: true) ~> source1
cotacoes select(mapColumn(
		moeda,
		compra_real,
		venda_real,
		compra_dolar,
		venda_dolar
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 derive(xml = replace(replace("<SERIE code= \"SERBRAOTC_USD_$moeda\" value = \"$venda_dolar\"/>",
            "$moeda", moeda),
            "$venda_dolar", venda_dolar)) ~> DerivedColumn1
